original_text: Jesus said to the bad spirits, ‘Go!’ So the bad spirits came out of the men and they went into the pigs. All the pigs rushed together down the hill into the lake. They all died there in the water.
korean_text: 그들에게 가라 하시니 귀신들이 나와서 돼지에게로 들어가는지라 온 떼가 비탈로 내리달아 바다에 들어가서 물에서 몰사하거늘

sentences.original_text: Jesus said to the bad spirits
So the bad spirits came out of the men
and they went into the pigs
down the hill into the lake
They all died there in the water
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 그곳 물 속에서 죽었다
